alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Jackson (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 1:58PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Jackson and northeastern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida, southwestern Decatur and central Seminole Counties in southwestern Georgia through 230 PM EDT/130 PM CDT/... At 158 PM EDT/1258 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles west of Chattahoochee, or 12 miles southeast of Marianna, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chattahoochee, Sneads, Grand Ridge, Altha, Ocheesee, Selman, Rosedale, Blue Spring, Recovery, Union City, Chipola, Henderson Mill, Lovedale, Jinks, Dellwood, Riverturn, Star, Alliance, Blountstown Airport and Buena Vista. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
